99/W/CS/428 METAL-AMENDED LIQUID SLUDGE
Object: To study the effects of zinc, copper and cadmium on soil microbial
activity with low organic matter inputs - Woburn, Butt Close West. Sponsor: S.P. McGrath, A. Chaudri. The fifth year, s. wheat. For previous year see 98/w/CS/428. Design: 3 randomised blocks of 13 plots. Whole plot dimensions: 1.2 x 3.5. Treatments: SLUDGE a T21 None (duplicated) 722 Uncontaminated (duplicated) 723 Zinc, rate 1 724 Zinc, rate 2 725 Zinc, rate 3 T26 Copper, rate 1 p 127 Copper, rate 2 28 Copper, rate 3 : 729 Cadmium, rate 1 : T30 Cadmium, rate 2 731 Cadmium, rate 3 Experimental diary:
22-Dec-98 : B: : Raked. Broadcast Riband, tr. Beret Gold, at 600
seeds/m by hand. Raked. 19-Mar-99 : B: : Raked. Broadcast Chablis, tr. Sibutol, at 330 seeds/m’ by hand. Raked.
29-Apr-99 : B: : Muriate of potash at 167 kg. 27% N at 630 kg.
07-May-99 : B: : Ally at 30 g in 200 1. 5
20-Aug-99 : B: : Hand harvested. NOTE: The w. wheat failed and was resown to s. wheat.
73

00/W/CS/428 METAL-AMENDED LIQUID SLUDGE Object: To study the effects of zinc, copper and cadmium on 20il microbial activity with low organic matter inputs - Woburn, Butt Close West. Sponsor: S.P. McGrath, A. Chaudri. The sixth year, grass. For previous year see 98-99/wW/CS/42B. Design: 3 randomised blocks of 13 plots. Whole plot dimensions: 1.2 x 3.5. Treatments: SLUDGE T21 None (duplicated) 722 Uncontaminated (duplicated) T23 Zinc, rate 1 724 Zinc, rate 2 725 Zinc, rate 3 T26 Copper, rate 1 T27 Copper, rate 2 T28 Copper, rate 3 T29 Cadmium, rate 1 T30 Cadmium, rate 2 T31 Cadmium, rate 3 Experimental diary: 28-Aug-99 : B: : Alpha Glyphogan at 3.0 1 in 200 1. 07-Sep-99 : B: : Hand dug and raked. 01-Oct-99 : B: : tm)PDO at 3.01 in 2001. : B: : tm)Enhance Low Foam at 100 ml in 200 1. 13-Oct-99 : B: : Hand raked. Broadcast Cotswold ryegrass Mix A at 40 kg. Rolled. 12-Nov-99 : B: : Spannit at 1.5 1 in 100 1. 25-Peb-00 : B: : Muriate of potash at 100 kg. 34.5% N at 116 kg. 19-Mar-00 : B: : Legumex Extra at 7.0 1 in 200 1. 07-Apr-00 : B: : Broadcast Danergo and Ligrane ryegrass 50:50 mix at 100 kg. 1l-Apr-00 : B: : 27.0% N at 407 kg. 14-Jun-00 : B: 3: Cut. 17-Jul-00 : B: : Azural at 4.0 1 in 200 1. 28-Jul-00 : B: : Topped. 75
